Public Remarks: The legendary Tsawwassen Beach 8 is a most stunning ocean bluff estate offering a rare opportunity of majestic ocean bluff views as well as a fun factor of owning your very own beach front. This 27,000sqft super sunny property exudes a styl ish contemporary flair while a newly constructed illuminated wooden staircase guides you through a pristine west coast nature paradise to your very own beach w/ moorage buoy for your personal boating enjoyment. The extremely private residence unfolds over super comfortable 8,000sqft architecturally designed living space w/ the main focus on the gorgeous never ending panoramic views. This luxury property represents an amazing opportunity to enjoy life to its fullest!

Public Remarks: Stunning panoramic views are had from this luxury Upper Dundarave (Queens) home. Situated at the end of a sought-after cul-de-sac, this exclusive family home boasts 5+ bedrooms & 6 bathrooms, level fenced yard and fabulous outdoor living. With 6000+ square feet, this residence's quality craftsmanship is evident throughout. Ideally located minutes from West Vancouver's best private & public schools, beaches, Dundarave village restaurants, and Downtown Vancouver. Brand new roof, air-conditioning, nanny accomodations & 3 car garage are featured. Sunrise to spectacular sunset, this south facing residence enjoys 180 degree views from all main rooms. A truly extraordinary West Vancouver gem. OPEN SAT/SUN 1-4.
Realtor Remarks: Professional measurements by Measuremasters. All measurements to be verified by buyer if deemed important. First showing at Agent's Open Thursday September 24th 10am-12pm. NO TOUCHBASE. www.reneecasano.com for video tour and additional photos.

Public Remarks: A spectacular Westhill residence on a 1/2 acre lot at the end of a cul-de-sac adjacent to a green belt, offering a quiet setting with spectacular ocean views to the south. Recently remodeled, this Ross Tallman built home offers 6,145 sq. ft. of contemporary living on 3 expansive levels featuring 5 bdrms and 4 baths. Exceptional quality and detail throughout with extensive built in millwork, spacious living/dining rooms, den with fireplace, gourmet kitchen, walk-in pantry, breakfast nook and a gorgeous family room with signature fireplace. Upper level features a fabulous master suite plus 3 more bedrooms and a library. The lower level features a separate entrance, fully equipped kitchen, 5th bedroom, media and recreation rooms.

Public Remarks: Beautifully built Dunbar Custom home with City & Mtn Views from main and upper level. Beautiful street just steps to Valdez Park. Built by Valentino and designed by Formworks this home will NOT disappoint. Over 4200 sq. ft of luxury living with top of the line finishes and appliances. Home boasts extensive use of custom millwork, vaulted ceilings and exquisite lighting and details. 4 Bdrms up all w ensuites. Fabulous views from the master and 2nd bdrms. A dream kitchen w large centre Island ideal for entertaining. The lower level is ideal for entertaining with wet bar, rec room and fabulous media room. School Catchments are Prince of Wales Sec and Lord Kitchener Elem. Wonderful family home on one of Dunbar's sought after streets. View by appt only. 3 Car Garage.
Realtor Remarks: 1st Viewings Tue Oct 6th by appt. Agents Open Wed Oct 7th 10-12. 2-5-10 Yr Warranty. Custom Home w Views. No For Sale Sign at request of seller.

Public Remarks: Seldom does such a beautiful, graceful & elegant home become available. With one of the most stunning panoramic views in all of W Vancouver this incredible 7,656 sq ft quality built & updated home sits on a gated 13,603 sq ft lot at the end of the Hudson Ct cul-de-sac. Absolutely nothing has been spared in the design, layout & considerable updates done in the past year. 5 Spacious bedrooms all ensuited - the master, spa-like ensuite & walk in closet just have to be seen. Beautiful principal rooms plus a 7 seated theatre, media room, gym, office, den, kitchen with butler's pantry, eating area, family rooms, steam shower, wine room, heated infinity pool, hot tub, aircon, heated driveway, radiant heating, pergola, decks, new landscaping.Too much to mention but a true masterpiece to be viewed.

Public Remarks: No 1 location in 1st Shaughnessy - Osler by the Crescent. A remarkable true balance of status, elegance, security captures the essence of 1st Shaughnessy living in this estate home.
